EmailTemplate.name: SM-2019-03-08-Cloud Optimization Survey.ES 1a - Cloud eBook Downloads - 04_19_Cl
EmailTemplate.subject: $10 Amazon Gift Card for 3 Minute Survey | Cloud Optimization
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://bit.ly/2GYk4AI]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Given you downloaded the Intro to IaaS eBook we published with O'Reilly last year, I wanted to follow up to learn more about how you're optimizing your cloud spend today. Answer this 3-Minute Survey <[[http://bit.ly/2GYk4AI]]> to help us understand your cloud questions and challenges so we can share more best practices that will address your most pressing issues.
Take Survey Now <[[http://bit.ly/2GYk4AI]]>
To say thanks, you will earn a $10 Amazon Gift Card upon completion of the survey. Furthermore, we are offering a $50 Amazon Gift Card for agreeing to a 30-minute meeting to learn how Turbonomic can help you optimize your cloud strategy. Regards, Elizabeth
